newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - WinStar started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - WinStar started as buy.

text.p: -- Dillon Read analyst Bill Vogel said he initiated coverage of WinStar Communications Inc with a buy rating.
-- He set a 12-month price target of $34 on the stock.
-- "We assume they are going to have at least one percent of the whole U.S. telecom market by 2005," Vogel said. He estimated the market would be worth $350 billion by that time.
-- Vogel said the company had a sustainable competitive advantage for telephone as well as high bandwidth applications.
-- The stock stood at 14-5/8, down 1/8, at 1250 EST/1750 GMT.
